description: This file sets up a Redis storage backend, defines an Article data model, creates agents for HackerNews and web search, and coordinates a team to generate a summarized article based on HackerNews top stories.
external_methods: Team(name, mode, model, members, storage, instructions, response_model, show_tool_calls, markdown, show_members_responses)

classes.name: Article
classes.description: A data model representing an article with title, summary, and reference links.

methods.name: hn_team.print_response
methods.description: Generates and outputs a response based on the team setup, in this case, an article about top HackerNews stories.
